message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique and valuable product. I believe it has the potential to bring significant benefits to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. However, I would like to propose a lower price of $950000 to make it more feasible for me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $950000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $975000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
